quoteText:
• to our business partners so that we can improve Likee Services;
  • to third-party advertising partners so that they can deliver ads they believe are relevant to you in other third party apps (for a list of our current advertising partners please visit Advertising Partners);
  • to cloud storage providers to store the information you provide;
title: Your personal data is given to third parties

tosdr.case: Your personal data is given to third parties
